title: Gammon and pancetta fidget pie
description: A hearty pie that hails from Shropshire - serve hot or cold as part of a picnic.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
1 free-range egg, beaten with a little milk
3 Maris Piper potatoes, peeled and cut into 1cm/½in slices
2 bramley apples, peeled cored and cut into 1 cm slices
